price: 16. Kaadu alsá ken (Qaranwa kinnuk) addal diifu abeeh, ayró ifa faanus abe.
arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِيهِنَّ نُورٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿala al-qamara fīhinna nūran wajaʿala al-shamsa sirājan
